argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idafval.i | |- I = ( IdA ` C ) |
| 2 |  | idafval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 3 |  | idafval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | idaf.a | |- A = ( Arrow ` C ) |
| 5 |  | #P_otex | |- <. x , x , ( ( Id ` C ) ` x ) >. e. _V |
| 6 | 5 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> <. x , x , ( ( Id ` C ) ` x ) >. e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Id ` C ) = ( Id ` C ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 7 | #P_idafval | |- ( ph -> I = ( x e. B |-> <. x , x , ( ( Id ` C ) ` x ) >. ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( HomA ` C ) = ( HomA ` C ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_homarw | |- ( x ( HomA ` C ) x ) C_ A |
| 11 | 3 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> C e. Cat ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> x e. B ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 11, 12, 9 | #P_idahom | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( I ` x ) e. ( x ( HomA ` C ) x ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( I ` x ) e. A ) |
| 15 | 6, 8, 14 | #P_fmpt2d | |- ( ph -> I : B --> A ) |
